comment: Vectors belonging to disjoint commuting subgroups are uniquely determined by their sum. Analogous to ~ opth , this theorem shows a way of representing a pair of vectors. (Contributed by NM, 5-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
